articles.content: Huddersfield Town have been hit with a significant injury blow for their end of season run-in as Matty Pearson has been ruled out potentially for the rest of the season with a knee injury suffered in… [+2311 chars]

articles.title: Frank Lampard names Yerry Mina Everton return date and makes Dominic Calvert-Lewin pledge - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Everton boss Frank Lampard has issued an injury update on Yerry Mina and addressed concerns over Dominic Calvert-Lewin's lack of goals
articles.content:
Everton manager Frank Lampard has revealed a comeback date for injured centre-back Yerry Mina while insisting that goal-shy striker Dominic Calvert-Lewin maintains his full support.
